M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ms.Main
The main method initializes the CommandParser and CLIHandler, and starts the game loop.
Main - Class in ms
The Main class serves as the entry point for the Minesweeper game application.
Main() - Constructor for class ms.Main
 
MEDIUM - Enum constant in enum class ms.model.Difficulty
The medium difficulty level with a 16x16 grid and 40 mines.
Messages - Class in ms.view
Utility class containing all static messages and formatting strings for the Minesweeper game.
MineField - Class in ms.model
The MineField class manages the grid of cells, mine placement, and adjacency calculations.
MineField(GridDimension, int) - Constructor for class ms.model.MineField
Constructs a new MineField with the specified dimensions and mine count.
MineFieldFactory - Interface in ms.logic
The DefaultMineFieldFactory class implements the MineFieldFactory interface to create instances of MineField with specified dimensions and mine count.
ms - package ms
 
ms.commands - package ms.commands
This package contains classes that handle user commands with parsing functionalities for the Minesweeper application.
ms.logic - package ms.logic
This package contains the central game engine that orchestrates all game mechanics, state management, and rules of the game.
ms.logic.operation - package ms.logic.operation
This package contains the core logic for handling operations that can be executed on the minefield.
ms.logic.rules - package ms.logic.rules
This package contains the validation rules for the operations on the Minesweeper game.
ms.logic.status - package ms.logic.status
This package contains the logic for managing the game state, including status transition, statistics tracking and timer functionality in the system.
ms.model - package ms.model
This package contains the fundamental data structures and domain objects that are used throughout the application.
ms.view - package ms.view
This package contains the view classes, implementing a command-line interface (CLI) that provides a visual interaction with the Minesweeper game.
